synopsis.text: Field House, a seemingly idyllic orphanage, becomes a nightmare for fifteen children who dare to seek freedom. Beyond its walls, they discover a world filled with unseen flora, fauna, and formidable demons. Despite the harsh realities of their new environment, these brave children refuse to surrender. Guided by a cryptic message from a mysterious figure named Minerva and a pen left behind by their friend Norman, they embark on a perilous journey to find a safe haven. Driven by a promise, they must return to the orphanage to save those they left behind, turning their escape into a battle for survival and a quest for a true home.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
